name: Card Image
description: Interactive card that pairs an image with title/subtitle content.

use: you want an image-led card with text content.
avoid: you only need a static image (use `Image`).

examples.minimal:
CardImage(
  image: Image.network('https://example.com/image.jpg'),
  title: const Text('Card title'),
)

theming: `CardImageTheme` controls button style, gap, and image scaling.
